translations: 使增长，推动；<美，非正式>偷窃；宣扬，推广

sentences.sentence: We need a big win to boost our confidence.
sentences.translation: 我们需要一个大的胜利来增强我们的自信心。

sentences.sentence: The tax cuts will give a much needed boost to the economy.
sentences.translation: 减税将给经济带来迫切需要的推动力。

sentences.sentence: Tax cuts will boost consumer confidence after the recession.
sentences.translation: 减税将增强消费者在经济衰退后的信心。
